intro: Perymenium stenophyllum, commonly known as the narrow-leaved perymenium, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, aromatic stems and small, clustered greenish-white flowers. The plant has pinnately divided leaves that are typically narrow and elongated. It is native to certain regions of southern Africa and thrives in moist, well-drained soils. Due to its ornamental value and medicinal properties, it is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
